answers.answer: You know what your comfort level is with that and we do know our own body better than anyone else.  There is a blood test called Fibrosure which I think LabCorp performs that will give you a good indication of scarring and damage to the liver.Trinity

question: No Biopsy.  I know a couple of people that have had a bad time with biopsys.  Last thing I want to go through.  Also from what I understand they are not fool proof as well.  I know I have liver disease and conformation seems like over kill.   The blood numbers and the diabetes I now have tell the story.Ron
title: trinty4
